name: August06.wad
description: A level for Deathmatch only. This level is for DEATHMATCH 2.0...please play it that way! It's bigger than my previous August wads, so DEATHMATCH 2 is best for this level... Play this level *strategilly* and it'll be a blast! Note: * skill 1/2/3 : All weapons available except the BFG * * skill 4/5 : all weapons available INCLUDING the BFG! *
